OCC to RgDaN: Yeah? I may recall that I lost, but I did because it was
reasonable, because I didn't want to mode like someone named RgDaN who never
loses because his characters don't take damage! You never cracked because
you didn't want to, and I have every right to make my characters say
anything they want to! You aren't the one to say what my characters can or
cannot say, and that's  fact, jack! That's all I got to say about that!...

From: <RgDaN@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>

Subject: Neo Beast Wars
